body_html:
• Regarding the case where the batch size is not know, does it make sense to just try/catch the call to gather_tree_from_array instead of trying to figure out the batch and beam dimensions?
  • For the returned value, I applied your suggestion to return the stacked form for reordered arrays and added a notice in the docstring.
body_text:
Regarding the case where the batch size is not know, does it make sense to just try/catch the call to gather_tree_from_array instead of trying to figure out the batch and beam dimensions?
For the returned value, I applied your suggestion to return the stacked form for reordered arrays and added a notice in the docstring.
body:
* Regarding the case where the batch size is not know, does it make sense to just try/catch the call to `gather_tree_from_array` instead of trying to figure out the batch and beam dimensions?
* For the returned value, I applied your suggestion to return the stacked form for reordered arrays and added a notice in the docstring.
